metadata.titleEn: Multi-scale surface flux and meteorological elements observation dataset in the Hai River Basin (Huailai station-lysimeters, 2014)
metadata.titleCn: 海河流域多尺度地表通量与气象要素观测数据集：怀来站-蒸渗仪-2014
metadata.description:
The dataset contains the observation data of evapotranspiration apparatus on January 1, 2014, solstice, December 31, 2014.The site is located in huailai county, hebei province, east garden town, the underlying surface for corn.The latitude and longitude of the observation point is 115.7880E, 40.3491N, and the altitude is 480m.
The collection frequency of evapotranspiration permeameter is 1 time/minute, and the released data is the average of 10 minutes.The evapotranspiration meter is a cylindrical structure with a surface area of 1m2 and a buried depth of 1.5m. The observation accuracy of evapotranspiration is 0.01mm.Two evapotranspiration seeptometers were installed, one kept bare soil (lysimeter_1), the other for the corn underlay (lysimeter_2) during the growing season (May 10 - September 15).Soil temperature and humidity probe, soil water potential probe and soil heat flow plate are also installed in the evapotranspiration apparatus.The buried depth of the soil temperature sensor is 5cm, 30cm, 50cm, 100cm and 140cm.The buried depth of the soil water sensor is 2cm, 10cm, 20cm and 40cm.The soil heat flux plate is buried 10cm underground;The buried depth of the soil water potential sensor was 30cm and 140cm.Processing and quality control of observation data :(1) ensure 144 data per day (every 10min). If data is missing, it will be marked by -6999;(2) delete the data of observation anomalies caused during maintenance;(3) data that is obviously beyond the physical meaning or the range of the instrument is deleted;(4) the format of date and time is unified, and the date and time are in the same column.For example, the time is: 2014-6-10-10:30.
The observation data released by the evapotranspiration permeameter include:Date/Time, weighing mass (i.l._1_wag_l_000 (Kg), i.l._2_wag_l_000 (Kg)), seepage mass (i.l._1_wag_d_000 (Kg), i.l._2_wag_d_000 (Kg)), soil heat flux (Gs_1_10cm, Gs_2_10cm) (W/m2),Multi-layer soil moisture (Ms_1_2cm, Ms_1_10cm, Ms_1_20cm, Ms_1_40cm, Ms_2_2cm, Ms_2_10cm, Ms_2_20cm, Ms_2_40cm) (%),Multi-layer soil temperature (Ts_1_5cm, Ts_1_30cm, Ts_1_50cm, Ts_1_100cm, Ts_1_140cm, Ts_2_140cm, ts_2_2_5cm, ts_2_2_50cm, Ts_2_100cm, Ts_2_140cm) (℃), soil water potential (TS_1_30 (hPa), TS_1_140 (hPa), TS_2_30 (hPa), TS_2_30 (hPa), TS_2_140 (hPa), TS_2_140 (hPa));The data is stored in *.xls format.
Please refer to Yang guangchao et al. (2015) for observation test or site introduction, and refer to Liu et al. (2013) for data processing.
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集包含了2014年1月1日至2014年12月31日的蒸渗仪观测数据。站点位于河北省怀来县东花园镇，下垫面为玉米。观测点的经纬度是115.7880E，40.3491N，海拔480m。
蒸渗仪采集频率为1次/分钟，发布数据为10分钟平均值。蒸渗仪为圆柱形结构，表面积为1m2，土柱埋深1.5m，蒸散量观测精度为0.01mm。蒸渗仪安装有两台，一台保持裸土（lysimeter_1），另一台在生长季（5月10日-9月15日）为玉米下垫面（lysimeter_2）。蒸渗仪内还安装有土壤温湿度探头、土壤水势探头和土壤热流板。土壤温度传感器埋设深度为5cm、30cm、50cm、100cm、140cm；土壤水分传感器埋设深度为2cm、10cm、20cm、40cm；土壤热流板埋设在地下10cm处；土壤水势传感器埋设深度为30cm和140cm处。观测数据的处理与质量控制：（1）确保每天144个数据（每10min），若出现数据的缺失，则由-6999标示；（2）删除了维护期间造成的观测异常的数据；（3）删除了明显超出物理意义或超出仪器量程的数据；（4）日期和时间的格式统一，并且日期、时间在同一列。如，时间为：2014-6-10 10:30。
蒸渗仪发布的观测数据包括：日期/时间Date/Time，称重质量（I.L_1_WAG_L_000（Kg）、I.L_2_WAG_L_000（Kg）），渗漏质量（I.L_1_WAG_D_000（Kg）、I.L_2_WAG_D_000（Kg）），土壤热通量（Gs_1_10cm、Gs_2_10cm）（W/m2），多层土壤水分（Ms_1_2cm、Ms_1_10cm、Ms_1_20cm、Ms_1_40cm、Ms_2_2cm、Ms_2_10cm、Ms_2_20cm、Ms_2_40cm）（%），多层土壤温度（Ts_1_5cm、Ts_1_30cm、Ts_1_50cm、Ts_1_100cm、Ts_1_140cm、Ts_2_5cm、Ts_2_30cm、Ts_2_50cm、Ts_2_100cm、Ts_2_140cm）（℃），土壤水势（TS_1_30（hPa）、TS_1_140（hPa）、TS_2_30（hPa）、TS_2_140（hPa））；数据以*.xls格式存储。
观测试验或站点介绍请参考杨光超等(2015)，数据处理请参考Liu et al. (2013)。

background: Based on the measurements of lysimeter, eddy covariance (EC), and automatic weather station (AWS) in Huailai Remote Sensing Experiment Station in 2012 and 2013, the daily and seasonal variation of soil evaporation and maize field evapotranspiration have been analyzed. The relationship between field evapotranspiration and meteorological factors (net radiation, air temperature, air humidity, and wind speed), soil moisture has been studied through multiple regression analysis method. Lysimeter’s representativeness was significantly affected by the growth of the crops within it. As heat can not be exchanged between the soil in lysimeter and the soil outside, the average temperature of the soil in the lysimeter is 9.5% higher than that of the field outside.
research objective: 本文利用2012年和2013年5-9月河北怀来中国科学院遥感综合试验站蒸渗仪观测资料，计算了玉米生长季的土壤蒸发、作物蒸散、降雨、渗漏量，结合气象因子探讨土壤蒸发和作物蒸散的日、季节变化规律，并比较分析涡动相关仪与蒸渗仪蒸散量的观测结果，验证蒸渗仪的代表性，初步分析两者差异产生的原因，为今后开展农田灌溉决策、农业节水等研究提供参考。
challenges: 蒸渗仪为单点观测，观测范围较小，其空间代表性有限，因此验证蒸渗仪的观测结果能否代表区域范围内农田的蒸散值十分有必要。即使进行能量闭合订正后，涡动相关仪观测的蒸散量较蒸渗仪偏低，蒸渗仪观测结果表现出高估的现象。强小嫚等认为蒸渗仪隔断了与周围农田的水热交换，导致的蒸渗仪内土壤水分供应与热交换与周围农田的不同，由此可能造成蒸渗仪对蒸散量的高估。
methods: 为研究华北区域农田蒸散发的变化特征，在研究区布设了一套多尺度蒸散发观测系统。实验区以图中红线为界，分为水浇地和旱地，水浇地和旱地分别架设了10 m气象塔和40 m气象塔，都安装了自动气象站和涡动相关仪，蒸渗仪和波文比能量平衡系统安装在位于水浇地的10 m气象塔处。根据试验需求，两台蒸渗仪中的一台保持裸土，作为对比另一台则种植玉米。为了保证在试验期间蒸渗仪内玉米和周围农田玉米生长条件一致，2012年5月5日和2013年5月10日，在其中一台蒸渗仪上种植了玉米，品种为郑单958，播种时间、行距和株距同周围农田一致，并且定期对蒸渗仪内土地进行除草，尽量保证蒸渗仪内玉米生长同周围农田一致。
dataset: 本研究所用的蒸渗仪为德国UMS公司生产的称重式蒸渗仪，型号为Hydro-Lysimeter。2011年9月11日安装于试验站外东侧约300 m处农田内，距农田外道路约10 m。蒸渗仪为圆柱状结构，表面积为1 m²，柱体高度为1.5 m，蒸散测量精度为0.1 mm。两台蒸渗仪共用一个维护井，维护井内安装了两个渗漏桶，用于蒸渗仪的渗漏量测量，测量精度为0.01 mm。此外，两台蒸渗仪内均安装有土壤水势、土壤温度、土壤湿度、土壤热通量传感器。
findings: The result shows that the daily variation curves of soil evaporation were quite consistent with maize field evapotranspiration, while seasonal differences were obvious. In the region of Huailai, net radiation and soil moisture obviously correlated with daily evapotranspiration, while other factors did not obviously correlate. The correlativity between evapotranspiration measured by EC and that by lysimeter is very good. The value of lysimeter is 10.5% higher than that of EC. As a result, the evapotranspiration of lysimeter is relatively larger.
backgroundCn: 根据2012年和2013年在怀来遥感实验站的蒸渗仪、涡度协方差（EC）和自动气象站（AWS）的测量数据，分析了土壤蒸发和玉米田蒸散的日变化和季节变化。通过多元回归分析方法研究了田间蒸散与气象因素（净辐射、气温、空气湿度和风速）、土壤湿度之间的关系。蒸渗仪的代表性受到其内作物生长的显著影响。由于蒸渗仪内的土壤与外部土壤之间无法进行热量交换，蒸渗仪内土壤的平均温度比外部田地高出9.5%。
research objectiveCn: 本文利用2012年和2013年5-9月河北怀来中国科学院遥感综合试验站蒸渗仪观测资料，计算了玉米生长季的土壤蒸发、作物蒸散、降雨、渗漏量，结合气象因子探讨土壤蒸发和作物蒸散的日、季节变化规律，并比较分析涡动相关仪与蒸渗仪蒸散量的观测结果，验证蒸渗仪的代表性，初步分析两者差异产生的原因，为今后开展农田灌溉决策、农业节水等研究提供参考。
challengesCn: 蒸渗仪为单点观测，观测范围较小，其空间代表性有限，因此验证蒸渗仪的观测结果能否代表区域范围内农田的蒸散值十分有必要。即使进行能量闭合订正后，涡动相关仪观测的蒸散量较蒸渗仪偏低，蒸渗仪观测结果表现出高估的现象。强小嫚等认为蒸渗仪隔断了与周围农田的水热交换，导致的蒸渗仪内土壤水分供应与热交换与周围农田的不同，由此可能造成蒸渗仪对蒸散量的高估。
methodsCn: 为研究华北区域农田蒸散发的变化特征，在研究区布设了一套多尺度蒸散发观测系统。实验区以图中红线为界，分为水浇地和旱地，水浇地和旱地分别架设了10 m气象塔和40 m气象塔，都安装了自动气象站和涡动相关仪，蒸渗仪和波文比能量平衡系统安装在位于水浇地的10 m气象塔处。根据试验需求，两台蒸渗仪中的一台保持裸土，作为对比另一台则种植玉米。为了保证在试验期间蒸渗仪内玉米和周围农田玉米生长条件一致，2012年5月5日和2013年5月10日，在其中一台蒸渗仪上种植了玉米，品种为郑单958，播种时间、行距和株距同周围农田一致，并且定期对蒸渗仪内土地进行除草，尽量保证蒸渗仪内玉米生长同周围农田一致。
datasetCn: 本研究所用的蒸渗仪为德国UMS公司生产的称重式蒸渗仪，型号为Hydro-Lysimeter。2011年9月11日安装于试验站外东侧约300米处的农田内，距农田外道路约10米。蒸渗仪为圆柱状结构，表面积为1平方米，柱体高度为1.5米，蒸散测量精度为0.1毫米。两台蒸渗仪共用一个维护井，维护井内安装了两个渗漏桶，用于蒸渗仪的渗漏量测量，测量精度为0.01毫米。此外，两台蒸渗仪内均安装有土壤水势、土壤温度、土壤湿度、土壤热通量传感器。
findingsCn: 结果显示，土壤蒸发的日变化曲线与玉米田的蒸散发非常一致，而季节差异则明显。在怀来地区，净辐射和土壤湿度与日蒸散发明显相关，而其他因素则没有明显相关性。通过EC测量的蒸散发与通过蒸渗仪测量的蒸散发之间的相关性非常好。蒸渗仪的值比EC高出10.5%。因此，蒸渗仪的蒸散发相对较大。

Verification.QuestionEn: Is it necessary to account for differences in soil temperature between the lysimeter and surrounding fields when analyzing data?
Verification.QuestionCn: 在分析数据时，是否有必要考虑 lysimeter 和周围田地之间的土壤温度差异？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Which factor is more influential in affecting the accuracy of lysimeter data: soil moisture differences, net radiation discrepancies, or the isolation of lysimeter soil from surrounding fields?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 哪个因素对影响蒸渗仪数据的准确性更具影响力：土壤湿度差异、净辐射差异，还是蒸渗仪土壤与周围田地的隔离？
Disjunctive.AnswerEn: The isolation of lysimeter soil from surrounding fields
Disjunctive.AnswerCn: 隔离渗滤仪土壤与周围田地。

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What are the primary data collection methods used for observing soil evaporation and crop evapotranspiration in the Huailai region?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在怀来地区观察土壤蒸发和作物蒸散的主要数据收集方法是什么？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: lysimeters, eddy covariance systems, automatic weather stations
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 土壤水分蒸发测定仪、涡度相关系统、自动气象站

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where are the lysimeters installed for data collection regarding soil moisture and evapotranspiration in the Huailai region?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在怀来地区，土壤湿度和蒸散发数据收集的 lysimeter 安装在哪里？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What challenges affect the spatial representativeness of evapotranspiration data collected using lysimeters?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 影响使用蒸发蒸散仪收集的蒸发蒸散数据空间代表性的挑战有哪些？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to measure soil evaporation and evapotranspiration in agricultural fields?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于测量农业田地土壤蒸发和蒸散发的数据收集方法的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: One example of a data collection method used to measure soil evaporation and evapotranspiration is the use of lysimeters, which are installed to monitor soil moisture, temperature, and heat flux at various depths. In the field described, lysimeters were used to observe the daily and seasonal variation of soil evaporation and maize field evapotranspiration in Huailai, integrating meteorological factors and soil moisture data.
Example.AnswerCn: 用于测量土壤蒸发和蒸散发的数据收集方法之一是使用蒸发计，这些设备被安装用于监测不同深度的土壤湿度、温度和热通量。在所描述的区域中，蒸发计被用来观察怀来地区土壤蒸发和玉米田蒸散发的日变化和季节变化，同时整合气象因素和土壤湿度数据。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you provide an example of how a research approach was used to study the relationship between evapotranspiration and meteorological factors in a specific region?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个研究方法的例子，说明如何研究特定地区蒸散发与气象因素之间的关系？
Example.AnswerEn: A research approach used to study the relationship between evapotranspiration and meteorological factors involved multiple regression analysis in the Huailai region. This approach analyzed the correlation of field evapotranspiration with factors such as net radiation, air temperature, air humidity, wind speed, and soil moisture. The findings indicated that net radiation and soil moisture were significantly correlated with daily evapotranspiration in this region.
Example.AnswerCn: 一种研究方法用于研究蒸散发与气象因素之间的关系，采用了多元回归分析，研究区域为怀来地区。该方法分析了田间蒸散发与净辐射、气温、空气湿度、风速和土壤湿度等因素的相关性。研究结果表明，净辐射和土壤湿度与该地区的日蒸散发显著相关。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics and challenges associated with the data collection techniques used in lysimeter-based meteorological studies?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 与基于蒸渗仪的气象研究相关的数据收集技术的特点和挑战是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: high-frequency measurements, 10-minute averages, limited spatial representation, potential for overestimating evapotranspiration, requires careful quality control
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 高频测量，10分钟平均，空间代表性有限，可能高估蒸散发，需要仔细的质量控制。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the properties and functions of the sensors used in soil-related measurements within a lysimeter system?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在土壤相关测量中，使用的传感器在蒸发计系统中的属性和功能是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: 5 cm, 30 cm, 50 cm, 100 cm, 140 cm, 2 cm, 10 cm, 20 cm, 40 cm, 10 cm, 30 cm, 140 cm
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 5厘米, 30厘米, 50厘米, 100厘米, 140厘米, 2厘米, 10厘米, 20厘米, 40厘米, 10厘米, 30厘米, 140厘米

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many data entries are expected daily from the lysimeter measurements, assuming no missing data?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 假设没有缺失数据，预计每天从蒸渗仪测量中获得多少条数据记录？

Definition.QuestionEn: What challenges are associated with using lysimeters for data collection in agricultural research?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在农业研究中使用 lysimeter 进行数据收集面临哪些挑战？
Definition.AnswerEn: Challenges associated with using lysimeters include their limited spatial representativeness due to being single-point observations, and their potential to overestimate evapotranspiration values. The lysimeter can isolate soil from its surroundings, leading to differences in water and heat exchange compared to the surrounding field, which may result in discrepancies in measured evapotranspiration. It is necessary to verify whether lysimeter observations can accurately represent field-scale evapotranspiration values.
Definition.AnswerCn: 使用蒸渗仪面临的挑战包括由于其为单点观测而导致的空间代表性有限，以及可能高估蒸散发值。蒸渗仪可以将土壤与周围环境隔离，导致与周围田地相比水分和热量交换的差异，这可能导致测得的蒸散发存在差异。因此，有必要验证蒸渗仪观测是否能够准确代表田间尺度的蒸散发值。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How does the data collection method using a lysimeter compare to using an eddy covariance system in terms of accuracy and representativeness of evapotranspiration measurements?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 使用 lysimeter 的数据收集方法与使用涡度协方差系统在蒸散发测量的准确性和代表性方面有何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Lysimeter measurements are affected by the isolation from surrounding soil, which can lead to higher temperature and potentially overestimated evapotranspiration values compared to eddy covariance systems. The eddy covariance system, despite energy closure corrections, tends to show lower evapotranspiration values than the lysimeter.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 土壤水分测定仪的测量受到与周围土壤隔离的影响，这可能导致温度升高，并可能高估蒸散发值，与涡度协方差系统相比。尽管涡度协方差系统经过能量闭合修正，但其蒸散发值通常低于土壤水分测定仪。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the differences in spatial representativeness between datasets collected using lysimeters versus automatic weather stations (AWS) in agricultural field studies?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在农业田间研究中，使用土壤水分测定器（lysimeters）与自动气象站（AWS）收集的数据在空间代表性方面有什么区别？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Lysimeters provide point-specific data with limited spatial representativeness, whereas AWS can cover broader areas, allowing for more comprehensive data collection on meteorological factors affecting agricultural fields.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 蒸渗仪提供特定点的数据，空间代表性有限，而自动气象站可以覆盖更广泛的区域，从而允许对影响农业领域的气象因素进行更全面的数据收集。

Comparison.QuestionEn: In terms of measuring soil moisture and temperature, how does the sensor depth positioning in a lysimeter setup compare to traditional field-based meteorological towers?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在测量土壤湿度和温度方面， lysimeter 设置中的传感器深度定位与传统的田间气象塔相比如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Lysimeter setups often have sensors positioned at multiple soil depths (e.g., 5cm to 140cm) to capture detailed soil moisture and temperature profiles, whereas meteorological towers typically focus on above-ground atmospheric conditions, providing different types of environmental data.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 土壤水分测定器的设置通常在多个土壤深度（例如5厘米到140厘米）处安装传感器，以捕捉详细的土壤水分和温度剖面，而气象塔通常关注地面以上的气象条件，提供不同类型的环境数据。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What can the observed differences between evapotranspiration values measured by eddy covariance systems and lysimeters reveal about the physical processes occurring in agricultural environments?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 观测到的通过涡度协方差系统和土壤水分测量仪测得的蒸散发值之间的差异可以揭示农业环境中发生的物理过程。
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The differences in evapotranspiration values observed between eddy covariance systems and lysimeters may highlight the physical processes of heat and moisture exchange. The lysimeter tends to show higher evapotranspiration values due to its isolation from surrounding soil, suggesting that soil moisture and heat dynamics are altered within the lysimeter compared to the surrounding field.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 在涡度协方差系统和蒸发蒸散仪之间观察到的蒸发蒸散值差异可能突显了热量和水分交换的物理过程。由于蒸发蒸散仪与周围土壤隔离，它往往显示出更高的蒸发蒸散值，这表明蒸发蒸散仪内的土壤水分和热量动态与周围田地相比发生了变化。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: In what ways do the installation and configuration of sensors within a lysimeter influence the accuracy and reliability of soil moisture and temperature measurements?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 传感器在蒸渗仪中的安装和配置如何影响土壤湿度和温度测量的准确性和可靠性？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The installation of sensors at various depths within a lysimeter, such as soil temperature sensors at 5 cm to 140 cm and soil moisture sensors at multiple shallow depths, provides comprehensive data on soil conditions. This configuration helps ensure accurate and reliable measurements by capturing vertical variations in soil properties, though it also requires careful calibration and quality control to address potential anomalies or biases.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 在土壤水分计中，在不同深度安装传感器，例如在5厘米到140厘米深度安装土壤温度传感器，以及在多个浅层深度安装土壤湿度传感器，可以提供全面的土壤条件数据。这种配置有助于确保通过捕捉土壤性质的垂直变化来获得准确可靠的测量，尽管这也需要仔细的校准和质量控制，以解决潜在的异常或偏差。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes the representativeness of lysimeter measurements to vary significantly when analyzing field evapotranspiration?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在分析田间蒸散发时， lysimeter 测量的代表性变化显著的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Lysimeter's representativeness is significantly affected by the growth of crops within it because heat cannot be exchanged between the soil in the lysimeter and the soil outside, leading to a higher average temperature inside the lysimeter compared to the field.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: lysimeter 的代表性受到其内作物生长的显著影响，因为 lysimeter 内的土壤与外部土壤之间无法进行热量交换，导致 lysimeter 内的平均温度高于田间温度。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why might lysimeter measurements of evapotranspiration be higher compared to those from eddy covariance systems?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么 lysimeter 测量的蒸散发量可能高于涡度协方差系统的测量值？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Lysimeter measurements might be higher because the system isolates soil from surrounding conditions, affecting water and heat exchange, which can result in an overestimation of evapotranspiration compared to eddy covariance systems.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 蒸渗测量可能会更高，因为该系统将土壤与周围环境隔离，影响水分和热量的交换，这可能导致与涡度协方差系统相比，蒸散发的估算过高。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the limited spatial representativeness of lysimeter observations in agricultural fields?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 影响农业田地中蒸渗仪观测空间代表性有限的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Lysimeters provide single-point observations with a small observation range, and their isolation from surrounding fields can limit their spatial representativeness and affect the generalization of evapotranspiration values to larger field areas.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 蒸渗仪提供单点观测，观测范围较小，且与周围田地的隔离可能限制其空间代表性，并影响蒸散发值向更大田地面积的推广。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the implications of using a lysimeter with limited spatial representation for understanding regional evapotranspiration patterns?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用空间表现有限的蒸渗仪来理解区域蒸散发模式的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using a lysimeter for single-point observations limits spatial representation and raises questions about whether its results can represent evapotranspiration values across a broader agricultural area. This limitation necessitates verification of its observations for regional applicability, as the isolated conditions within the lysimeter can lead to differences in soil moisture and heat exchange compared to surrounding fields.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用蒸渗仪进行单点观测限制了空间代表性，并引发了其结果是否能代表更广泛农业区域的蒸散发值的问题。这一限制要求对其观测结果进行区域适用性的验证，因为蒸渗仪内的孤立条件可能导致与周围田地相比，土壤湿度和热交换存在差异。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How does the presence of crops within a lysimeter affect the accuracy of evapotranspiration measurements compared to surrounding fields?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 作物在蒸发蒸散仪中的存在如何影响与周围田地相比的蒸发蒸散量测量的准确性？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The presence of crops within a lysimeter affects the accuracy of evapotranspiration measurements because it disrupts the natural exchange of heat and moisture with the environment, causing the soil inside the lysimeter to have a higher average temperature by 9.5% compared to the outside field. This can result in an overestimation of evapotranspiration values when compared to measurements from eddy covariance systems.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 作物在蒸发蒸散测量中的存在会影响测量的准确性，因为它干扰了与环境的自然热量和湿气交换，导致 lysimeter 内的土壤平均温度比外部田地高出 9.5%。这可能导致与涡度协方差系统的测量相比，蒸发蒸散值的高估。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of using different data collection systems, such as lysimeters and eddy covariance, on the observed evapotranspiration values?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用不同的数据收集系统，如土壤水分测量器和涡度协方差法，可能对观测到的蒸散发值产生哪些潜在影响？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using different data collection systems like lysimeters and eddy covariance can lead to discrepancies in observed evapotranspiration values. For instance, lysimeter measurements tend to be higher than those from eddy covariance due to the lack of heat exchange with surrounding soil, which can affect water and heat supply dynamics. Despite energy closure corrections, eddy covariance might report lower evapotranspiration, highlighting the need for cross-verification and understanding the systematic differences between the methods.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用不同的数据收集系统，如蒸渗仪和涡度协方差，可能会导致观测到的蒸散发值存在差异。例如，蒸渗仪的测量值往往高于涡度协方差的测量值，因为蒸渗仪与周围土壤之间缺乏热交换，这会影响水分和热量的供应动态。尽管进行了能量平衡修正，涡度协方差可能仍会报告较低的蒸散发值，这突显了交叉验证和理解不同方法之间系统性差异的必要性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the key objectives of implementing multi-scale evapotranspiration observation systems in agricultural research areas?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在农业研究领域实施多尺度蒸散发观测系统的关键目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary objective is to study the characteristics of farmland evapotranspiration in the North China region, assessing daily and seasonal variations in soil evaporation and maize field evapotranspiration, as well as understanding the relationship with meteorological factors like net radiation and soil moisture. This research supports agricultural irrigation decision-making and water-saving strategies.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标是研究华北地区农田蒸散的特征，评估土壤蒸发和玉米田蒸散的日变化和季节变化，以及理解与气象因素如净辐射和土壤湿度的关系。这项研究支持农业灌溉决策和节水策略。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to compare the evapotranspiration measurements from different instruments like lysimeters and eddy covariance systems?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 比较不同仪器（如蒸发蒸散仪和涡度协方差系统）测量的蒸发蒸散量是重要的原因是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Comparing these measurements is crucial to verify the representativeness and accuracy of the lysimeter observations, which tend to overestimate evapotranspiration due to isolated conditions that differ from surrounding fields. This comparison helps in understanding the discrepancies and improving the reliability of evapotranspiration data for broader agricultural applications.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 比较这些测量结果对于验证土壤水分观测的代表性和准确性至关重要，因为由于与周围田地的隔离条件，土壤水分观测往往会高估蒸散发。这种比较有助于理解差异，并提高蒸散发数据在更广泛农业应用中的可靠性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methods can be used to ensure the accuracy and reliability of lysimeter data collection for soil and crop evapotranspiration studies?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 可以使用哪些方法来确保土壤和作物蒸散发研究中蒸渗仪数据收集的准确性和可靠性？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The accuracy and reliability of lysimeter data collection can be ensured by implementing a robust data processing and quality control protocol, which includes ensuring daily data completeness, removing anomalies caused by maintenance, and deleting data that exceeds physical or instrumental limits. Regular calibration of sensors and cross-validation with other instruments like eddy covariance can also enhance data reliability.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 确保蒸渗仪数据收集的准确性和可靠性，可以通过实施一个强有力的数据处理和质量控制协议来实现，该协议包括确保每日数据的完整性、去除因维护造成的异常数据，以及删除超过物理或仪器限制的数据。定期校准传感器和与其他仪器（如涡度协方差）进行交叉验证也可以增强数据的可靠性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How is the installation of lysimeters and associated sensors configured to capture comprehensive soil and atmospheric data in agricultural settings?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 如何配置 lysimeters 和相关传感器的安装，以在农业环境中捕获全面的土壤和大气数据？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Lysimeters are installed with a cylindrical structure and a surface area of 1m², buried to a depth of 1.5m. They are equipped with soil temperature sensors at various depths, soil moisture sensors, soil heat flow plates, and soil water tension sensors. The sensors are strategically placed to capture different layers of soil conditions, ensuring a thorough data collection of both soil and atmospheric factors.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 蒸渗仪采用圆柱形结构，表面积为1平方米，埋深为1.5米。它们配备了不同深度的土壤温度传感器、土壤湿度传感器、土壤热流板和土壤水分张力传感器。这些传感器被战略性地放置，以捕捉不同土层的土壤状况，确保对土壤和大气因素的全面数据收集。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What steps are involved in setting up a multi-scale evapotranspiration observation system in a research area to study agricultural water use efficiency?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn:
在研究区域建立多尺度蒸散发观测系统以研究农业水利用效率的步骤包括：

1. 确定研究区域：选择适合的农业研究区域，考虑土壤类型、作物种类和气候条件。

2. 设定研究目标：明确研究的具体目标，例如评估不同作物的水利用效率或比较不同灌溉方法的效果。

3. 选择观测尺度：根据研究目标选择适当的观测尺度，包括局部（田间）、区域（农场）和大尺度（流域）。

4. 选择观测设备：根据不同尺度选择合适的蒸散发测量设备，如气象站、土壤水分传感器、遥感技术等。

5. 部署观测设备：在研究区域内合理布置观测设备，确保覆盖不同的土壤和作物类型。

6. 数据采集与管理：定期采集蒸散发、气象、土壤水分等数据，并建立数据管理系统以便于后续分析。

7. 数据分析与模型建立：利用收集的数据进行分析，建立蒸散发模型，评估水利用效率。

8. 结果验证与调整：对模型结果进行验证，必要时调整观测系统或模型参数，以提高研究的准确性。

9. 结果传播与应用：将研究结果传播给相关利益方，如农民、政策制定者等，并探讨其在实际农业管理中的应用。
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To set up a multi-scale evapotranspiration observation system, the research area is divided into irrigated and dryland sections, each equipped with meteorological towers and instruments like eddy covariance and automatic weather stations. Lysimeters are installed in irrigated sections, with one left bare and another planted with crops like maize to ensure comparable growth conditions. Regular maintenance and calibration ensure accurate data collection.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了建立一个多尺度的蒸散发观测系统，研究区域被划分为灌溉区和干旱区，每个区域都配备了气象塔和仪器，如涡度协方差系统和自动气象站。在灌溉区安装了蒸发皿，其中一个保持裸露，另一个种植了玉米，以确保生长条件的可比性。定期的维护和校准确保数据收集的准确性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What methodologies enable researchers to accurately control and compare soil conditions within and outside a lysimeter to ensure representative data collection?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些方法论使研究人员能够准确控制和比较 lysimeter 内外的土壤条件，以确保代表性数据的收集？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Researchers use multiple regression analysis to study the relationship between evapotranspiration and meteorological factors, ensuring that lysimeter data is compared with field data. Additionally, to maintain consistency in soil conditions, crops in lysimeters are planted with the same variety, spacing, and timing as surrounding fields, and regular maintenance such as weeding is conducted.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 研究人员使用多元回归分析来研究蒸散作用与气象因素之间的关系，确保将蒸渗仪数据与田间数据进行比较。此外，为了保持土壤条件的一致性，蒸渗仪中的作物与周围田地种植相同的品种、间距和时间，并定期进行除草等维护工作。

Enablement.QuestionEn: Which technological tools are crucial for enhancing the precision of evapotranspiration measurements in agricultural research settings?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 在农业研究环境中，增强蒸散发测量精度的关键技术工具有哪些？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The use of dual lysimeters, eddy covariance systems, and automatic weather stations are crucial for precise evapotranspiration measurements. These tools allow for comprehensive monitoring of soil moisture, temperature, and heat flux, providing data that is critical for understanding soil and crop interactions.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 双重蒸渗仪、涡度协方差系统和自动气象站的使用对于精确的蒸散发测量至关重要。这些工具能够全面监测土壤湿度、温度和热通量，提供对理解土壤与作物相互作用至关重要的数据。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do soil moisture and meteorological sensor placements within a lysimeter facilitate detailed data collection for agricultural studies?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 土壤湿度和气象传感器在蒸渗仪中的布置如何促进农业研究的详细数据收集？
Enablement.AnswerEn: In the lysimeter setup, soil moisture sensors are placed at various depths (2cm, 10cm, 20cm, 40cm) along with temperature sensors at multiple soil layers (5cm, 30cm, 50cm, 100cm, 140cm) to capture detailed vertical profiles of soil conditions. This multi-layered data collection approach helps in understanding the soil-plant-atmosphere interactions comprehensively.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 在蒸渗仪设置中，土壤湿度传感器被放置在不同深度（2厘米、10厘米、20厘米、40厘米），同时在多个土壤层（5厘米、30厘米、50厘米、100厘米、140厘米）中安装温度传感器，以捕捉土壤条件的详细垂直剖面。这种多层数据收集方法有助于全面理解土壤-植物-大气之间的相互作用。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might the representativeness of data collection using lysimeters be limited in agricultural research?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 使用 lysimeters 进行农业研究的数据收集的代表性可能受到限制的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Lysimeters provide single-point observations with limited spatial representativeness, which is crucial in agricultural research where conditions can vary significantly across a field. Additionally, lysimeters can disrupt natural soil-plant-atmosphere interactions, leading to discrepancies in soil moisture and heat exchange compared to surrounding fields.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 蒸渗仪提供单点观测，空间代表性有限，这在农业研究中至关重要，因为田间条件可能会显著变化。此外，蒸渗仪可能会干扰自然的土壤-植物-大气相互作用，导致与周围田地相比，土壤水分和热量交换出现差异。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What factors could lead to discrepancies between evapotranspiration measurements collected by different methods such as lysimeters and eddy covariance systems?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 导致通过不同方法（如蒸渗仪和涡度协方差系统）收集的蒸散发测量值之间出现差异的因素有哪些？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Discrepancies may arise because lysimeters can isolate the soil within them from external environmental exchanges, causing differences in water and heat dynamics compared to the external field. This isolation might result in higher soil temperatures and moisture within the lysimeter, leading to higher recorded evapotranspiration values compared to eddy covariance systems.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 由于蒸发皿可以将其内部的土壤与外部环境交换隔离，因此可能会出现差异，这导致与外部田野相比，水分和热量动态存在差异。这种隔离可能导致蒸发皿内的土壤温度和湿度较高，从而导致记录的蒸散发值高于涡度协方差系统。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why is it necessary to ensure consistent growth conditions within lysimeters and surrounding fields during data collection for crop studies?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在作物研究的数据收集过程中，确保 lysimeter 及其周围田地内的一致生长条件是必要的，原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Consistent growth conditions are needed to ensure that the data collected within the lysimeters is representative of the surrounding fields. Variations in planting time, crop type, and maintenance can influence crop growth and evapotranspiration, potentially leading to biased or unrepresentative data if lysimeter conditions differ significantly from the surrounding agricultural area.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 一致的生长条件是确保在土壤水分计中收集的数据能够代表周围田地的必要条件。种植时间、作物类型和维护的变化可能会影响作物生长和蒸散作用，如果土壤水分计的条件与周围农业区域有显著差异，可能会导致数据偏差或不具代表性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How do you assess the impact of crop growth within lysimeters on the accuracy of evapotranspiration measurement, and what methodological strategies could be employed to mitigate any identified issues?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估作物生长在 lysimeter 中对蒸散发测量准确性的影响，以及可以采用哪些方法策略来减轻任何识别出的问题？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Crop growth within lysimeters significantly impacts evapotranspiration measurements due to isolation from surrounding soil conditions. This can lead to discrepancies in soil moisture and temperature. Methodological strategies to mitigate these issues could include calibrating lysimeter data with other measurements, such as eddy covariance, or adjusting for energy balance discrepancies to enhance accuracy.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 作物在 lysimeter 中的生长对蒸散发测量有显著影响，因为它们与周围土壤条件隔离。这可能导致土壤湿度和温度的差异。减轻这些问题的方法策略可以包括将 lysimeter 数据与其他测量（如涡度协方差）进行校准，或调整能量平衡差异以提高准确性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don’t understand why the spatial representativeness of a single-point observation method like lysimeter is considered limited in this domain?
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白为什么像蒸发皿这样的单点观测方法的空间代表性在这个领域被认为是有限的。
Assertion.AnswerEn: A single-point observation method such as a lysimeter is considered to have limited spatial representativeness because it only measures the evapotranspiration at its specific location, which may not accurately reflect the variability across a larger agricultural field or region. Factors like soil type, crop variety, and environmental conditions can vary across a field, leading to differences in evapotranspiration that are not captured by a single lysimeter.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 单点观测方法，如蒸渗仪，被认为具有有限的空间代表性，因为它仅在特定位置测量蒸散发，这可能无法准确反映更大农业田地或区域的变异性。土壤类型、作物品种和环境条件等因素在田地中可能存在差异，从而导致蒸散发的差异，而这些差异并未被单个蒸渗仪所捕捉。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore potential data collection methods that can complement lysimeter observations to enhance the understanding of evapotranspiration dynamics in agricultural fields.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨可以补充土壤水分观测的潜在数据收集方法，以增强对农业田地蒸散发动态的理解。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Complementary methods include using eddy covariance (EC) systems and automatic weather stations (AWS) to measure meteorological factors such as net radiation, air temperature, air humidity, and wind speed. These methods, when combined with lysimeter data, can provide a broader understanding of evapotranspiration dynamics and help verify the lysimeter's representativeness.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 互补方法包括使用涡度协方差（EC）系统和自动气象站（AWS）来测量气象因素，如净辐射、空气温度、空气湿度和风速。这些方法与土壤水分测量仪（ lysimeter）数据结合，可以提供对蒸散发动态的更全面理解，并帮助验证土壤水分测量仪的代表性。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please identify and discuss the significance of datasets that can be utilized to study the seasonal variation of soil evaporation and crop evapotranspiration in North China agricultural regions.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请识别和讨论可以用于研究中国北方农业地区土壤蒸发和作物蒸散季节变化的重要数据集。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Datasets from lysimeter, eddy covariance, and automatic weather station measurements are significant as they provide insights into the daily and seasonal variations of soil evaporation and crop evapotranspiration. These datasets are crucial for analyzing the correlation between field evapotranspiration and meteorological factors, aiding in agricultural water management and decision-making.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 来自蒸渗仪、涡度协方差和自动气象站测量的数据集非常重要，因为它们提供了土壤蒸发和作物蒸散的日常和季节变化的见解。这些数据集对于分析田间蒸散与气象因素之间的相关性至关重要，有助于农业水管理和决策。
